remarks: Scalar ring of a structure product.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
prdsbas.p $e |- P = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsbas.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
prdssca $p |- ( ph -> S = ( Scalar ` P ) ) $.
